channel.title: Omfg! 'the drops from monsters don't show up.! help!
channel.description:
omfg! oke here is my problem.
i putted in drops. and the monster and etc.now it doesn't drop!. i tried several tutorials, like 5 of them. all didn't work, it doesn't show the drop. anyone knows the problem :confused:

item.title: Omfg! 'the drops from monsters don't show up.! help!
item.dc:creator: @junkyNL junkyNL
item.description:
@junkyNL wrote:

ummmmm maybe u have the drop problem like on some servers when ANYTHING drops somthing it like dissapers and no one ever sees the item so get that checked out ok?

i think ur right, even system79 did it for me. he couldn’t fix it for me 2. i think its the problem above ^^ anyone knows how to fix that?

Read full topic
